alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Geneva and northwestern Holmes Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Geneva, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Samson, Coffee Springs, Spears, Eunola, Barker Store, Sellersville, Lytle, Highfalls, Marl, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Sweetgum Head, Royals Crossroads, Geneva Municipal A/P, Vaughanville, New Hope and Somerset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
